experience.highlights: Delivered a 500% improvement in debt recovery (£200K to £1.2M) by leading the design and implementation of an automated end-to-end collection process. Contributed to both Frontend and Backend, end-to-end developing new features for web applications using Vue.js, TypeScript, and Kotlin across customer-facing and internal back-office platforms. Optimised the Smart Meter Booking Portal to enhance user experience, resulting in an increase in conversion rates.

Created a React Dashboard which connects to HP Siteflow API and allows users to view and manage printing devices. This was created to improve on searchability of devices since Siteflow's own dashboard takes a lot of time to navigate due to pagination and was championed by the IT team to manage 200+ devices. Wrote bash and Powershell scripts to automate tasks on Linux and Windows devices used within the Production line

Maintenance and administration of AD Environment including security and policies. Creating scripts for automation to improve tasks and software deployment. Managing Windows Servers and Linux workstations used in the factory.
